programme.title: Midway to Love
programme.desc: When the network announces that her television therapy show is changing to a tabloid shock-fest, a straight laced and caring psychologist returns to her hometown and reunites with her high school sweetheart while finally realizing that having someone to share a life with is more important than fame and the excitement of the city.

programme.title: Love Unleashed
programme.desc: After her dog runs away Sarah learns he's been adopted. As she and the new owner, Mike, battle over custody the pair fall in love. But Mike has a secret and Sarah walks away. Can true love prevail?

programme.title: The Farmer and the Belle – Saving Santaland
programme.desc: When she visits her childhood home, sparks fly between a famous model and a farmer with a young daughter. The town is in danger of losing their beloved Santaland festival, but miracles can happen with a little love, family, and faith.

programme.title: Scents and Sensibility
programme.desc: In this modern adaptation of Jane Austen’s Sense and Sensibility, Elinor and Marianne find themselves penniless after their father’s fortune is taken away. As they look for ways to pay the bills, they encounter people who judge them and try to keep them down in the dumps. Add falling in love into the mix, and determining whom to trust becomes a mine field. Can the sisters find a balance between relying on their hearts and using good sense without losing everything they hold dear?

programme.title: Love in Tahiti
programme.desc: Brielle has always believed the ocean floor is full of treasures just waiting to be found. Over the years she has dived to find coins, lost jewelry and more in the waters of Tahiti. Instead of profiting from them, she loves reuniting people with their lost valuables. When she finds a class ring and returns it to Marcus, a handsome US Navy serviceman, Brielle soon discovers what has been missing in her life – a treasure of the heart.

programme.title: Cinderella in the Caribbean
programme.desc: Ashlyn Vanderbilt travels with her stepmother Miriam and her fiancé Bruce for their destination wedding. Although Ashlyn finds friendship and love with Bruce's son, Noah, she struggles to have her happily ever after when she discovers that her stepfamily plans to ruin Bruce.

programme.title: The Dance
programme.desc: A poignant comedy-drama about the intricacies of love and romance. For three couples one night will change everything!
